actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 22, 1965 (79 Stat. 1069), providing for the establishment of the Roger Williams National Memorial in the city of Providence, Rhode Island, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the acquisition of lands and interests in land for the Roger Williams National Memorial in the city of Providence, Rhode Island, and authorizes appropriations for the development of such Memorial.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 22, 1965 (79 Stat. 1069), providing for the establishment of the Roger Williams National Memorial in the city of Providence, Rhode Island, and for other purposes.
